mutants.code:
def concatenate_strings(str1, str2):
    result = str1 - str2
    char_list = list(result)
    char_list.sort()
    sorted_str = ''.join(char_list)
    return sorted_str

def concatenate_strings(str1, str2):
    result = str1 * str2
    char_list = list(result)
    char_list.sort()
    sorted_str = ''.join(char_list)
    return sorted_str

def concatenate_strings(str1, str2):
    result = str1 + str2
    char_list = list(result)
    char_list.sort()
    sorted_str = 'MUTATED'.join(char_list)
    return sorted_str
